events.name: onRowAction
events.description: Handler that is called when a user performs an action on the row.
events.description_zh: 当用户对行执行操作时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onCellAction
events.description: Handler that is called when a user performs an action on the cell.
events.description_zh: 当用户对单元执行操作时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onSelectionChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the selection changes.
events.description_zh: 在所选内容更改时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onSortChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the sorted column or direction changes.
events.description_zh: 当排序的列或方向更改时调用的处理程序。

:children.description: The elements that make up the table. Includes the `TableHeader`, `TableBody`, `TableColumn`, and `TableRow`.

color.type: default / primary / secondary / success / warning / danger
color.description: Color of the selected rows, and checkboxes.
color.description_zh: 所选行的颜色和复选框。

layout.description: Defines the layout of the table.

shadow.description: The shadow size of the table.

hideHeader.description: Whether to hide the table header.

isStriped.description: Whether to apply striped rows in the table.
isStriped.description_zh: 是否在表中应用条带化行。

isCompact.description: Whether to apply compact style to the table.
isCompact.description_zh: 是否将紧凑样式应用于表格。

isHeaderSticky.description: Whether to make the table header sticky.

fullWidth.description: Whether to make the table full width.

disableAnimation.description: Whether to disable the table and checkbox animations.
disableAnimation.description_zh: 是否禁用表格和复选框动画。

removeWrapper.description: Whether the table base container should not be rendered.
removeWrapper.description_zh: 是否不应呈现表基容器。

:BaseComponent.description: A custom wrapper component for the table.
:BaseComponent.description_zh: 表的自定义包装器组件。

:topContent.description: Provides content to include a component in the top of the table.
:topContent.description_zh: 提供内容以在表的顶部包含组件。

:bottomContent.description: Provides content to include a component in the bottom of the table.
:bottomContent.description_zh: 提供内容以在表的底部包含组件。

topContentPlacement.description: Where to place the topContent component.

showSelectionCheckboxes.description: Whether the row selection checkboxes should be displayed.
showSelectionCheckboxes.description_zh: 是否应显示行选择复选框。

:sortDescriptor.description: The current sorted column and direction.

:selectedKeys.description: The currently selected keys in the collection (controlled).
:selectedKeys.description_zh: 集合中当前选定的键（受控）。

:defaultSelectedKeys.description: The initial selected keys in the collection (uncontrolled).
:defaultSelectedKeys.description_zh: 集合中初始选择的键（不受控制）。

:disabledKeys.description: A set of keys for rows that are disabled.

disallowEmptySelection.description: Whether the collection allows empty selection.

selectionMode.description: The type of selection that is allowed in the collection.
selectionMode.description_zh: 集合中允许的选择类型。

selectionBehavior.description: How multiple selection should behave in the collection.
selectionBehavior.description_zh: 多选在集合中应如何表现。

disabledBehavior.description: Whether `disabledKeys` applies to all interactions, or only selection.
disabledBehavior.description_zh: “disabledKeys”是应用于所有交互，还是仅适用于选择。

allowDuplicateSelectionEvents.description: Whether `onSelectionChange` should fire even if the new set of keys is the same as the last.
allowDuplicateSelectionEvents.description_zh: 即使新键集与上一组键相同，是否应触发“onSelectionChange”。

:checkboxesProps.description: Props to be passed to the checkboxes.
:checkboxesProps.description_zh: 要传递给复选框的道具。

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the dropdown item slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为下拉项槽设置自定义类名。

slots.name: base
slots.description: Defines a flexible column layout and relative positioning for the table component.
slots.description_zh: 定义表组件的灵活列布局和相对位置。

slots.name: wrapper
slots.description: Applies to the outermost wrapper, providing padding, flexible layout, relative positioning, visual styles, and scrollable overflow handling.
slots.description_zh: 适用于最外层的包装器，提供填充、灵活布局、相对定位、视觉样式和可滚动溢出处理。

slots.name: table
slots.description: Sets the table to have a full minimum width and auto-adjusting height.
slots.description_zh: 将表格设置为具有完整的最小宽度和自动调整高度。

slots.name: thead
slots.description: Specifies rounded corners for the first child row in the table header.
slots.description_zh: 为表标题中的第一个子行指定圆角。

slots.name: tbody
slots.description: No specific styles are applied to the body of the table.
slots.description_zh: 没有特定样式应用于表的正文。

slots.name: tr
slots.description: Styles for table rows including group focus, outline properties, and a set of undefined focus-visible classes.
slots.description_zh: 表格行的样式，包括组焦点、大纲属性和一组未定义的焦点可见类。

slots.name: th
slots.description: Styles for table headers, including padding, text alignment, font properties, and special styles for sortable columns.
slots.description_zh: 表格标题的样式，包括填充、文本对齐方式、字体属性和可排序列的特殊样式。

slots.name: td
slots.description: Applies to table cells, with properties for padding, alignment, and relative positioning, plus special styles for first child elements, selection indication, and disabled cells.
slots.description_zh: 适用于表格单元格，具有填充、对齐和相对定位属性，以及第一个子元素、选择指示和禁用单元格的特殊样式。

slots.name: tfoot
slots.description: No specific styles are applied to the footer of the table.
slots.description_zh: 没有特定样式应用于表格的页脚。

slots.name: sortIcon
slots.description: Styles for sorting icons, with properties for margin, opacity, and transition effects based on sorting direction and hover state.
slots.description_zh: 用于对图标进行排序的样式，具有基于排序方向和悬停状态的边距、不透明度和过渡效果的属性。

slots.name: emptyWrapper
slots.description: Defines style for an empty table, with text alignment, color, and a specified height.
slots.description_zh: 定义空表的样式，包括文本对齐方式、颜色和指定的高度。

slots.name: loadingWrapper
slots.description: Style applied when the table is loading, positioning it centrally in its container.
slots.description_zh: 加载表时应用的样式，将其放置在容器的中心位置。
